Title: Genocide
Plot: The gang war erupts in unexpected ways that Vic cannot control; Dutch and Billings' homicide investigation grows into something more disturbing; Cassidy reaches out to Danny.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
GuestStars: Laurie Holden, F.J. Rio, Ludwig Manukian, Michael Bofshever, Kyle Gallner, Jose Pablo Cantillo, Autumn Chiklis, Frances Fisher
